author: Special Correspondent
text:
The AIADMK’s election manifesto committee met on Thursday to finalise the party’s draft manifesto for the coming Assembly elections.

The committee consisting of senior Ministers, including O. Panneerselvam, Natham R.Viswanathan, R.Vaithilingam, Edappadi K. Palaniswami and P. Palaniappan and senior party leaders S. Ponnaiyan and Deputy Speaker of Lok Sabha S. Thambidurai and IT wing secretary ‘Aspire’ Swaminathan met for around five and half hours to finalise the suggestions. They also discussed poll strategies.

The party supremo and Chief Minister Jayalalithaa had constituted the committee to study previous manifestoes and get suggestions from former officials of various departments and the people.

Ms. Jayalalithaa had recently announced in the Assembly that she had fulfilled all the promises made in the 2011 manifesto.
title: AIADMK leaders meet to draft manifesto
